title: Google Revenue Per Employee
text: The Leading Source of Insights On Business Model Strategy & Tech Business Models The Leading Source of Insights On Business Model Strategy & Tech Business Models Google generated $1,684,332 per employee by 2023 compared to $1,486,779 per employee in 2022. As of January 2023, as the company announced a mass layoff, it returned its revenue per employee at $1,586,880, still behind the peak in 2021, for $1,840,330.
